page.title: 08Old Coulsdon
page.content: Old coulsdon is a residential area, with mainl detached and semi-detached houses. There is one parade of fourteen shops. There is a wide range of shops, for example:- greengrocers, Post Office, chemist, mini-market, butcher, and baker. People of all ages use these shops, and the busiest days are Fridays and Saturdays. We interviewed a lady in the mini-market, and she said "it's tiring working here". Old Coulsdon has a public bus service with five bus routes: the 109,190,411,409, and 166. The people questioned at the bus stop thought the service was efficient and punctual. In some parts of Old Coulsdon ther is a problem with vandalism. A survey around Byron School showed that graffiti was the main problem.
